job.title: Cloud Engineer
job.description: P.S. Kindly apply only if you are ELIGIBLE to work in Canada. We do not provide sponsorship/ Visa services.<br><br>The Cloud Engineer may be responsible for but is not limited to;<br><br>Programming experience in one or more programming languages (Java, C/C++, C#, Objective C, Python, JavaScript).<br>Development experience including experience with new DevOps tools and methods AND/OR Agile Development.<br>Experience with one or more Infrastructure as Code tools such as Cloud Formation, Deployment Manager, Terraform, Ansible<br>Experience in software systems design, with experience in architecting distributed systems<br>Experience in architecting, developing and/or maintaining production-grade systems<br>Experience in virtualization, multi-tenant cloud infrastructures, storage systems and content delivery networks<br>Strong development experience and delivery history in key scripting languages (Ruby, Python, Powershell, Groovy) or another common programming language<br>Proven experience with a cloud provider (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure)
